channel.title: Aircraft on Carrie’s Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Aircraft on Carrie’s Portfolio

item.title: Electric Aircraft Project
item.description: Hybrid-electric distributed propulsion retrofit of a Cessna 310R, balancing sustainability, efficiency, and performance.

item.title: AIAA Design, Build and Fly Competition
item.description: Contributed to avionics development for a UAV in the AIAA DBF competition, focusing on flight control, motor selection, and sensor integration.

item.title: Autonomous Flight Systems Lab
item.description: Research with Prof. Christopher Lum on nonlinear 6-DOF modeling, simulation, and flight visualization.
